content.detailedDescription:
1.  when i saw the object, my husband and i were walking the dogs outside at approximately 9:15 p.M.  i always look up to the stars at night. 

2.  i was looking up at the stars like i do each night and directly over my  house was this moving object.  i noticed it because not only was the craft moving from left to right, but the object shape was endulating like little waves or something.  the endulation was contained within the shape of the boomerang. it was light gray and was visible in the dark sky.

3.  i first thought i was viewing a flock of birds flying in a "v" formation, but dismissed it quickly because the shape was too perfect having very defined edges.  i've seen flocks of birds flying before and they are always making noises and never in a perfect formation.  the object emitted no sound at all.  

4.  the object was in the shape of a boomerang, but not with a pointy tip.  where the tip would be, it was straight. it was moving quickly, but not like an airplane.  i saw it for only 10 or 15 seconds.  the endulating motion was contained within the shape of the object.  it came from the south and was moving to the north.

5.  my husband saw the flying object as well. i was a little shocked to have seen something so strange. we had a flashlight to watch our doggies and i was afraid that the object would see us with our flashlight.  i was a little bit scared.  i immediately went into our house and called my boys and told them what we saw.

6.  the object disappeared into the night sky.
content.summary: The object was in the shape of a boomerang, grey in color, no lights, no sound, and the object was andulating, like a lot of little waves on the object.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on san felipe and turning right onto voss.  i noticed an object a black orb some what oval shaped heading east bound about the same altitude as the police helicopters fly in the area.  the object then banked left at a slow rate of speed.  i could see see the sunlight reflecting off of the top and it gave off sheen that looked silver as it moved passed the sun's rays.  then the object headed north along voss towards i-10.  i tried to follow the object down voss, but it was moving too fast.  traffic crawled to a stand still just passed woodway so i watched it until it was out of site.  i would say it moved at about twice the rate of a helicopter.  it traveled in a straight line due north.  it didn't bob or weave.  it's path was straight, and it seemed to move with a purpose.  the whole event was over by about 4:05pm.  there were no noticeable sounds but there was a lot of traffic.  no engine noise that would be associated with a plane or helicopter.  i was in my car and i have no pictures.
content.summary: Houston

content.detailedDescription:
I just so happened to get up when i never do, and go out to smoke.  i don't normally get up at that time, but my dog that was sleeping on my legs made me hot. i am  a professional worker that generally does not believe in this stuff.  i just went out to my garage.  i was looking at how clear the sky was, and just looking at the stars, as i love stars.  strangely, i noticed some flashing lights. i might be looking at an airplane.  after staring several minutes at the object...I noticed an orange light in the center, then...Several whitish lights that seem to show and fade at the same time (if that makes any sense).  it wasn't until i saw the object move that i became frightened, in fact...Shaking.  you know...When that visceral moment that you know it's something your brain can't handle that you become afraid...I experienced that.   i watched the object and it appeared that it had glowing lights coming out from the triangle of lights sort of coming/shooting out from it (i'm a visual person...So it's hard to explain) and the way it moved.  it moved from right to left in a nano second (exaggeration, i'm sure), and up and down in that same, instant of a move.  i have never seen an airplane or helicopter move that way. 

i am a professional, that finds entertainment in this stuff, but i was literally afraid.  so afraid, in fact, that i woke my husband up and he thought a burglar had come into our house.  i told him what was happening, and he came out and verified that he saw the flashing lights, though they had moved further away. he verified he saw what i was looking at, so that made em feel better that i was not sleepwalking, given the fear that i felt.  he then went in and i stayed out watching the lights.  they seemed to be further away, yet fading. i feel like i'm nuts writing this in here still, but i know what i saw was bizzare, and not normal. maybe it is explained, but it was frightening to me.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three glowing lights, red light in center

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work when on my street my car turned its self off a bright flash of light then looking up i saw a red triangle of lights shoot off at a fast rate and the car turned back on 15 min later you could hear what sounded like wind and gears turning in the middle of the woods.
content.summary: Flash of light triangle of red lights

content.detailedDescription: We were inside eating pizza when my cousin's son called and told us to go outside and look at the sky because there were three bright red lights.  so we went out back of the house facing west and saw the 3 lights in the sky. first of all, there was not a star in the sky. there must have been high cloud cover. the sky was pitch black and all you could see were these bright red lights in a triangular form hovering at what appeared to be approximately 3000-5000 feet in the sky. the lights were steady but seemed to glow. they did not blink. there was absolutely no sound. they were as bright as stars, but red in color. they were the only lights in the sky. we watched them for almost 20 minutes as they slowly moved from northwest to southeast. after about 15-20 minutes, we stopped to talk to my cousin's neighbors for a second and when we looked back up, one of the lights had vanished. we watched for a few more minutes, when the lower right light vanished. within a second or two, the third light vanished. we couldn't tell if they just went out or seemed to fly off. it appeared to be three separate objects, but i cannot be sure. they did seem to elongate at one point, but it was hard to tell if that was due to our perspective in relationship to where it was. it also appeared that one of the sides of the triangles moved further apart at one point; but again, that could be due to our perspective. i want to stress that there was absolutely no sound and the lights were steady. the video makes them seem to blink or glow, but that is due to the video. the lights also seemed much closer and brighter in person than on the video. i've had people speculate that they were sky lanterns, aircraft and satellites.  however, because they were below the clouds, that rules out satellites. i believe they were too bright for sky lanterns, but that may be the most common explanation. unless our government has completely silent aircraft with steady red lights that do not blink, i can't imagine it being aircraft. it took nearly 20 minutes to travel maybe 20 miles. i'm not sure what it was, but it would be nice to have some sort of explanation. watching the object(s) was surreal for all of us. we all felt very strange as if anything could happen at any time. all sorts of thoughts were going through our heads. you can hear much of what we were thinking in the video.
content.summary: 3 bright red lights in triangular form. no sound. no blinking.

content.detailedDescription: i have been taping the nights sky for some time now because i have been seeing this star like object in the southwestern sky that looks like nothing i have seen in my 37 years of star gazing. when on march 27 2011 at or around 11:30 that night i was outside in my front yard video taping that object that i have been noticing when a flash that looked like a shooting star caught my eye it shot across the sky from east to west and then suddenly stopped which amazed me because of what it was able to do  i then proceeded to zoom in for a closer look. there were two objects one was a flashing light that was above and to the right of the other which i could not focus on and the other  looked  like  a cigar or some sort of cannon and what look to be something above this object honestly it looked like the sky above this object was warped or opened opened up i wish i could find the words to describe what i saw very humbling for me. unfortunately my battery started to flash because it was low and i could only get approximately 7 minutes of video of this object with my cameras battery being low it kept me from getting a better picture because it wouldn't let me use my night vision which if i could have used that i would have seen this ship with a better view this object did not move it was stationary in the western sky very very high in the sky i can only wish i had a full battery so i could have gotten more video time of it
content.shape: Blimp,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Star-like,   Unknown
content.summary: I was video taping the night sky when a flash caught my eye i then zoomed in to see this object

content.detailedDescription:
Just a typical few minutes of filming in mankato.  the sky is literally crawling with these things.  whats all the fuss about?  it's been this way for a long time, but people are pretty hush hush and or unawares.  very common aerial activity here in mankato.  these things are out in broad daylight also constantly.  no one cares to look up i guess.  the daylight ones are the most shocking, in my opinion.  they can be seen by anyone who figures out the program going on here.  deep.

2 miles/near mankato
7pm approx.
1st noticed because i went to see them here
feelings: same old same old.
lose sight: i just stopped filming and went home


contact info included 

*youtube link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg.
content.summary: *youtube link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg.

content.detailedDescription: my friend and i were driving back to pender from west point nebraska on a weekend morning, as we approached within a few miles of pender i noticed a large bright light to the east side of highway 9. at first i really thought the light was just an aircraft landing gear light since it was so bright and so close to the ground, then i realized that there are no airports in the area and the light didn���t appear to moving in any direction. i watched the light for about 5 to 10 minutes before i said something to my friend who was driving, once he saw the light we agreed to stop on top of the next hill so we could get a better look and see if we could tell if it was an aircraft light. we stopped just north of the intersection of v road and highway 9 with a feed lot just to our southeast by about a half mile and the light was still to our east at about 5 to 10 miles at first guess. as we sat there we both realized that we didn���t have any way of knowing what time it was since the owner of the truck toke the radio face plate out of the truck before my friend and i left west point ne. the last time we saw a clock it was around 1:30 am and that was when we left west point. as we sat there i had my friend shut the engine off so that we could listen for jet engine noise or the thud of helicopter rotors, but once he shut the engine off we didn���t here any noise coming from the direction of the light. we both grew up around aircraft, my father was in the air force in sioux city and my friend grew up within 3 miles of the same air base so we both were familiar with the different sounds created by all sorts of aircraft and their lights. the longer we sat there the more we talked about it and realized that this was no aircraft of any type and that the light was closer then we first thought 5 miles max from where we were parked. we sat there for an unknown amount of time when suddenly the light went from very bright to almost unable to see it. it went down to a red light so dim it looked just another star in the sky, and after a few minutes it went back to its full bright white light again. within a few minutes of the light becoming bright again we both saw a beam of light like a spot light pointing the ground, the beam which started at the light came down towards the ground in the south direction at about a 40 to 45 degree angle. the beam was white in color and not as bright as the light in the sky, and because of the hilly area we could not see the point of impact of the beam. after a minute or two we both heard a blood chilling animal screaming sound and then the beam stopped like someone just hit the off switch on a spot light. we were kind of frozen in the spot once we saw the beam and heard that sound, we both wanted to get out of there but at the same time we both were afraid that staring the truck and turning on the lights might draw attention to our location plus we still wanted to know what was going on over that area. we were unable to tell if the sound we heard came from the area of the beam but it was unlike any animal that either us have every heard in our life���s. again after a few minutes after we saw the beam the light in the sky once again dimed down to a very small red light as bright as nearby stars, this time we both noticed headlights coming from the south on the highway about 2 miles from us. once the car on the highway passed our position and continued north out of sight the light became bright again. in the time that we sat there on the side of the road we had a few cars pass by coming from both the north and south, each time once a car got within a few miles of our location the light in the sky would dim down and once the car was a few miles passed us the light would again become very bright as if it was trying to hide from those cars. we sat there for about an hour or two; only way we could tell time is by how many cigarettes that we smoked. as the time went by i noticed the trees that were only about 10 feet from our truck would light up and then get dark again, like on a night with a full moon and patchy clouds, but this was happening with the flow of traffic like the light in the sky to our east so i figured it was just the head lights causing it. then my friend starting looking around and discovered a light to the south west of our location, just as bright and as low to the ground as the first one. he kept his eyes on that one and i kept a look out on the one to our east, this had to go on for another half hour or so not once did either of the lights appear to move at all just grow dim as cars came near and then brighten back up once those cars passed. i finally got the courage up to step out of the truck since i had a full bladder and really needed to go, as i was standing there i just happened to look up to see if there was a full moon and discovered the third light directly above our location. now once i saw that i was back in the truck screaming at my friend to start the truck and floor it back to pender, once i told him that there was third light over us he did start the truck and never toke his foot off the floor till we were back in the town of pender. the drive to town only toke a few minutes at speeds hitting 90 mph but to the both of us it seemed like forever, i kept looking in the mirrors and out the rear window to make sure the lights were not chasing us but after a mile i couldn���t find any of them in the sky.  i can say we were both truly scared out of minds about what we had seen and the fact that a third light was over our heads not making a sound for god knows how long! now once we got it to pender the bank clock was at about 4:30 so we figure we spent a few hours out there parked on the side of the highway looking at these lights, at highway speeds it really only takes 30 minutes to get from west point to pender but since we had no way of telling time neither of us can account if we lost time or not. since then my friend and i haven���t really mentioned this incident to anybody but close friends and he and i rarely speak of it to each other.
content.summary: Bright lights near feed lot south of pender ne

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a front ocean condo and i was walking my dog in an area on my building where i was able to see the ocean. this was around 3pm. suddenly something caught my eye and when i looked i saw 3 small super bright round objects playing around in a fast pace, above the seashore. i knew i never saw something similar like this before and i decided to rush upstairs (i live in the 14th floor) and try to take a picture if they were still around( i don���t have a great camera with a big zoom). it took me about 30 seconds to spot one of them above the ocean and one of them going along the shore in opposite direction. notice that they were really small. from my terrace, they were no longer bright but yellow and orange shaped as a blimp and were now going very slow. i could not hear a sound. there was no one at the beach at that time that i could see. (i thought about remote control toys but no one was there controlling them and i also, later on, did a research about remote control toys that are similar to the ones i saw. i could not find any) suddenly i lost one of them and the one i took a picture, was flying very close to the water horizontally. suddenly it stopped and started to go up in the sky until i could not see it anymore. i saw no strings, no fire, no smoke, no sound.

ps: sorry my english. it���s my second language.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three  bright small round objects flying/playing around over the seashore/ocean

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving with my sister and friend on a back road by my house, when i saw a bright white/blue orb of light hovering about ten feet above the treetops. it looked to me to be about as big as an suv. as i got closer along the road, the light began to expand and increase in brightness. when i was about 20 yards from the object, (as i was driving still), it shot off at an unbelieveable speed across the road and was lost from sight. . my sister and friend, were talking and joking in the back of the car, and because of this missed the whole thing, as it was probably a minute or less. i told them what i saw and we were all very excited to see it again.I attempted to drive in the direction it went, but was unable to find it.
  when i returned home, my brother had very interesting news. his first words to me were "justin just saw a ufo!" justin was our friend. he and my brother were sitting outside my house in our street. justin saw a bright orange orb floating above the cul de sac. it moved from left to right, before going down into the trees behind the cul de sac, as if it was landing. this was happening at approx the same time as my sighting. the distance between where we saw these objects is about 1 mile.
content.summary: I was driving when i saw a bright white/blue orb floating above the treeline.

content.detailedDescription: At 11:15, a friend and i we���re in the alley behind work, having a cigarette. the sighting took place in downtown ann arbor. my friend looked up and exclaimed, ���what the **** is that?���  he pointed directly upwards to a triangular object who���s three points were each designated by a soft, blue light. the object seemed not to cruise a regular speed, but to sort of float and pivot slightly back and forth, headed in a general northwest direction. the object itself was barely discernible, except the back looked slightly concaved, or fish-tailed. we saw the object floating for about 15 seconds before it disappeared behind the buildings in the city.
content.summary: Blue triangle ufo spotted over downtown ann arbor

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 12:05am, i had just passed the guard gate of century village in pembroke pines, fl. where my mother resides and approaching the building while riding my motorcycle, i noticed two dark red lights almost burgundy in color up in the sky that caught my eyes. i also observed two airplanes to the left side of these red lights. the planes were easily identified by their wings, general shape and the green and red lights on each wing, however, the dark red lights were much larger in size and appeared to be independent of one another. i noticed how these lights separated as they traveled through heavy clouds and each went in separate directions. i immediately stopped and got off my bike to get a good glance at the nearest of the two red lights which suddenly stopped illuminating the red color and broke through a heavy cloud and now observed the object charcoal grey in color below the cloud directly over me possibly about one mile up and perfectly detailed as a round disk shape with a smaller round disk in the center with lines that radiated from the smaller center round disk in several pie shaped patterns outward. the disk traveled fast in a westard direction as it passed directly overhead. judging by the speed of the nearby private and commercial planes, i would have to estimate the speed of the disk to be between 4 to 5 times faster. my observation of seeing this ufo that displayed so much classic detail had me in shock and while the experience seemed surreal at first, i immediately attempted to video record and then snap some still images using my cell phone camera. as the disk progressively escaped my vision behind neighboring trees, i mounted my motorcycle and proceeded to give chase in order to position myself for better photographs and i soon found myself racing behind it for a few miles then totally losing site of it by the time that i reached state road 27/ okeechobee road all the time looking up searching for the ufo, i proceeded west on i-75 towards naples, florida at a high rate of speed, but upon realizing that i had lost it, i turned back and returned home in coral springs, where i immediately started searching the internet for photographs to compare my sighting to and was completely shocked to see that the ufo that i had observed was nearly identical in detail to other ufo's that were reported by pilots and law enforcement personnel in the past.  i do not know if the videos and still photos that i attempted to take can be reviewed by an expert but i would be glad to show whomever is interested in them. the attached photo is an internet drawing that is remarkably similar in shape and design to the ufo that i observed earlier today.
content.summary: Observed a charcoal disk shaped ufo flying overhead and attempted to video and take still pho

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning to work from a delivery, i parked my car, got out, and as always, hoping, i looked up at the sky, clouds, i looked east standing at the corner of stroop and far hills, and saw, what at first looked like the wright flyer at a distance, it looked as if it was descending, and slowing. the main reason it could not have been the flyer is because of the humidity, the sky was a little cloudy and the flyer doesn't fly in certain humidity levels, and the day was very humid. the craft was moving westerly over far hills ave, towards me. i had contacts in that day, so staring was a little hard, specially at the distance, which would be hard to explain. i kept wanting to enter the restaurant and call someone out, but i couldn't move. not that i was paralized, i could move, but it was as if i couldn't. i didn't want to take my eyes off of it in fear of it disappearing. it moved west, in my direction, and then turned south. it was almost as if it was driving, west on stroop to south on far hills. it is hard to explain what i say, as i said, it almost looked like the flyer, in shape, it looked boxy or some square like shape almost like a car. i can differentiate airplanes from very high up, or far out, depending on how it turns and what is seen when the turn happens. but when this object turned, the shape did not change there was no tilt of one side, lift of the other, it just turned, almost 90 degrees with no problem. the vehicle, or object, kept going south, until it went out of sight. at some point after the turn, another driver arrived from a delivery and i asked him to look and tell me what he thought it was, he looked and, mentioned a weather balloon... i explained the movement it made, plus it wasn't going in the winds direction. i had the other driver to go inside and get someone but by the time they got outside, the object was too far to recognize. the oddest part is that there was no sound coming from the craft. again, with airplanes, there is always a motor noise, even at far distances, but this thing didn't produce any sounds, that i could tell. i tried to take a picture with my phone, but that camera sucked big time, anything further than 10 feet looked horrible. 
 i was ecstatic, all my life i had wanted to see a space craft, i have always wanted and wished for an encounter, and had always been able to debunk my sightings by recognizing them as planes, helicopters or birds. this thing i couldn't make out. i was in awe, hating myself for not having at least some weak binoculars, which i now have and keep in my car. i honestly didn't care who said what, i honestly saw a ufo since i was not able to identify the object. i cannot say it was a spacecraft, alien or otherwise. i am a believer. i know that aliens exist, i feel i know they've been here, are here, and probably will always be here, as they have been. the day after, i searched the papers to see if anyone else had seen it, but either no one saw it, or as i did, they just kept it to themselves.  
 please let me know if anyone else had seen this, reported about this, or other sightings in the dayton/cincinnati, oh areas. i hope someone can look into this and help me ease my mind and figure out what the heck that was. 
thank you for your time.
content.summary: Almost looked like the wright flyer

content.detailedDescription: I left my girl friends house aroun 11:00 sunday night 3/28/2011. i was heading south on main rd in tiverton ri, as i came ovever the top of the last hill before i get onto the highway, i could see 3 bright lights stationary over my home town, portsmouth ri. its a very clear night with unlimited visability. i quickly pulled into the parking lot of little bear lounge, i stopped and got out, i took my cell phone and i took a couple of shots of them. i observed the for about 10 minutes before the smaller of the 3 blinked out and was gone, the second one then started to move to the east before i lost it. the third and final one remained for a while longer before it moved away, as i pulled into my driveway i noticed the 3 rd one moving north over the mount hope bridge, but it was no longer a bright white light, it appeared to have 3 or 4 red lights and the center one was blinking, then i lost sight of it.
content.summary: 3 bright lights over portsmouth ri

content.detailedDescription: While driving home along the seward highway, i was at ~mile 4 heading north when up ahead in the sky i saw what i at first though were very large stars although that didn���t make sense.  they were more of an orange color and much too large to be stars; i didn���t count them, i guesstimate around 9, always staying an equal distance from each other.  when i first saw them one end appeared to be below the tree line so i thought someone must be flying a string of something from their house (this too didn���t seem likely but in my head i was desperately trying to make sense of what i was seeing), however as i proceeded along the highway i got to where i was right underneath the lights (seward highway and stony creek ave) and found they were not below the tree line and in fact were very slowly moving along in a southerly direction (toward town).  they were not in any formation, more like a string of lights moving along together although when i first saw them and was making my way closer (and therefore the angle of my view changing as i went) some of them formed into a pentagon for a short time. i stopped when they were right above me, as it was night i can���t really say how high they were but maybe another trees length above tree line.  after i stopped i tried to focus in on one to see if i could make out the shape but it was too bright.  i decided to go the rest of the way to my house and get a neighbor to look with me but as soon as i got just a ways down the road they were out of sight below the tree line and i did not go back for another look.
content.summary: I saw what seemed to be a string of lights, large orange spheres moving very slowly in a southerly direction.

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling westbound i276 at 9:26pm, i passed the fort washington interchange. i looked at the clock because i was curious how long it took me to get to this point as i was traveling to my brother's residence and i was in a hurry. (it was getting late and i was tired. i rise at 5:15am).

the turnpike is straight from before the interchage at fort washington heading west for a few miles. it is however not level. i was traveling in the middle lane. i believe you pass under an overpass approximately midway in the straight section of road prior to its bending to the left at the top of the rise. as i past the overpass, i looked up and forwared of my position to notice what appeared to beaircraft leading edge landing lights approximatel 2 inches across( looking at your outstretched hand to measure. i thought that , well there is a military base nearby, forgetting that the base has been closed. the visibility here is focused forward somewhat not only because of your direction of travel, but also because the embankments to either side rise 25 ft or more. in addition there are3 tall trees on bothe sides at the top of the embankments.
 at approximately 65 mph i expected that the lights would get brighter and further apart as i approached and i expected it would do the same. most aircraft lights for landing are brighter than the other lights. these brighter lights were on the outside edges, with the less bright lamps on the inside of the "wingtip" lights. they were in a row and a single white strobe was blinking slightly below and centered. all lights were white. red lamps are traditionally on the left of the aircraft, and green on the right side of the aircraft wingtip. assuming it was coming toward me, i would have expected to see these shortly. within 20-30 second it appeared 5-6 inches across, again using your hand at arms length to measure. i wasn't thinking of looking for colored lamps. i was thinking that it was odd for an aircraft to be that low over an interstate. perhaps it needed to land, a provision from the interstate design( allowing x number of miles of straight away for emergency landings was part of the design. as i approached what seemed to be almost underneath its position, i realized that it was not moving fast, i had overtaken its position and it was not coming toward me , but away from me, and it appeared to be going slower that i was. how curious.. at that point the road bends to the left about 25 or 30 degrees. i looked out the window not once, but twice and could not see the lights anymore. the lights were on the trailing edge, not the leading edge, unless it turned away immediately as i had traveled to the left on the highway i didn't see it again.

the distance of the lights were comparable in feeling to watching jets fly overhead on a landing strip. it felt large. at least the size of a jet airliner. before rounding the bend i had my last look at the lights,(before i lost sight of it). my thoughts were that it was large, an aircraft?, and it must be low for its lights nearly spanned the visible clearing of sky between the tree lines on both sides of the highway...I was actually ducking while looking out of th car toward it
content.summary: Aircraft like lights, in a row, all white, one white strobe, very slow,lights were trailing

content.detailedDescription: I was with a girlfriend on top of moon rocks in bonny doon, california, which is located on a high elevated hill on martin rd. i have been a frequent visitor since i moved to santa cruz in 2002. we were the only ones there, talking about life, and enjoying the view of the pacific ocean and and the stars, as the moon was waning, i think. i was looking over the ocean, and i saw what looked like a falling star. i often see them. i told the girl to turn around and she saw, what appeared to be a falling star. it was very bright. it looked like it was going to fall into the ocean, and the ocean below it started to light up a rather large area, because it was not hard to see from where i was, miles away. maybe 10 miles or less. anyway, the object stopped before it hit the ocean, and so far no more than 5 seconds had elapsed. the object rose suddenly and hovered over the ocean. it was not a plane. i could not see how the object looked, as its lights had turned off. but i could still see the object, with what looked like dim lights. then, it suddenly turned around and i saw a green flame come out of a jet, and the object turned out towards the pacific and took off flying away and upwards at a sharp angle. the girl saw it too. she was amazed. i though it was military, but i don't know. it was shaped like a disc, metallic and shiny. very quick, and it must have been somewhat large for me to see it. the green color of the flame surprised me. it all happened so suddenly. no more than 10 seconds. before i knew it, there was no trace of the object. there was definitely a back and front of the object, as the green flame was so bright, that i finally saw the entire shape of the object from the back.I saw cylinders, maybe two or three, from which the green flame came. a disc shape...
content.summary: A falling star, which turned out to be a flying aircraft

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were sitting outside of my house smoking cigarettes when we noticed the three lights in the sky. there were clouds in the sky, but not where the lights were coming from. we were facing south, and we were in east longmont, near 9th and county line rd 1. we proceeded to watch the lights, confused, because they were all the same brightness, much brighter than stars, and they were barely moving. it was very hard to tell how far they were from us. we sat there for an hour or two watching them, unable to look away. they moved very slowly, but changed from a triangle that seemed somewhat even when it came to lengths apart from each other. but as they slowly moved, two of the white lights got closer to each other, but the other dot either remained in the same place, or moved farther away from the other two, it was very hard to tell how they were moving. it was not an airplane, it was much to far away to be an airplane by the size of "it" or "them". i actually had forgotten about this until i watched the videos and saw the pictures of the ufo sightings in lafayette, because as soon as i saw the footage, it set me back immediately to what i saw about a year and a half ago or so.. it's hard to remember the exact date but i believe what i saw happened between late october to december 2009. unfortunately, i didn't get any pictures because me and m only had our phones, which didn't capture the lights.
content.summary: 3 lights in the sky moving incredibly slow, started out as a triangle, then turned into a sort of right triangle.. and then disappeared one by one.

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i were driving to his house from mine. it was around 10:30pm, we were about a mile from his house outside imlay city, mi. i looked out the drivers side window and noticed an orange ball in the sky, it was just hovering in the air. after a few seconds of discussing what it could possibly be, my cousin pulled the car over on the side of the road. we sat there for about 5 minutes just watching this orange ball of light, it looked like it was over imlay city or just outside imlay city. then it started moving northeast kind of quick, the next thing we knew the orange light just vanished and in the exact place where the orange ball vanished, red and blue flashing lights appeared, which looked like aircraft lights, but they were flashing faster than aircraft lights ive seen before. i was a mechanic on f-15 aircraft in the air force, and this was totally different. we then watched the red and blue lights go behind some trees and we lost track of it. this is not the first ufo i have seen. my cousin had not seen one before that night.
content.summary: Orange light hovering in the sky, started moving ne and just disappeared. after the light disappeared there appeared to be aircraft lights where the object was.

content.detailedDescription: Shortly after 11 at night, i was on the way back to my house with two friends. while looking out the window i noticed what looked like the headlights of a car in the sky. i assumed it was a helicopter at first because it was clearly hovering. once our car was directly below the object, however, i observer from a very short distance that the object was very oddly shaped and now had green, red and white lights in odd placements along the edges of what looked like an obtuse scalene triangle. the craft then began to travel with our car but then boasted two very bright lights and one red one. like i said, i was right below it and i could clearly see a perfectly solid triangular shape disproving a blimp or helicopter as explanations. after driving further up the road, the object sped off very quickly and stopped relatively far away but in plain sight still. it maintained that position for about 5 seconds, then simply vanished. my friends and i were all amazed by what we had just seen although i think we were all too embarrassed to say it was a ufo. it was honestly one of the most incredible experiences of my life, so i felt it necessary to report the sighting. hopefully my writing skills do not spoil the magnitude of the situation for whoever reads this. i had my phone in my pocket so i really wish it would have occurred to me to film the spectacle but i was far too entranced to consider that. sorry, but enjoy!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Close contact with unknown aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I was in the driveway taking the dog out and something told me to look up in the western sky.  i first thought they were birds, but then realized that i couldn't see birds up that high.  there were 3 triangular shaped objects with circular patterns on each of the corners.  they were flying in circular motions, it was then that i realized i was seeing something abnormal.  i ran in the house to get my girlfriend so she could see.  when we returned outside, 2 of the objects were gone and one was still there, hovering in the sky.  about a minute later a jet, traveling at a very high rate of speed approached the object and the object just vanished.  the jet then circled around the area for about 5 minutes afterwards and left the area.
content.summary: 3 triangular shaped objects in broad daylight, clear blue sky, few puffy clouds

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? i was in the state of michigan pennitentary. the location of the prison was i.T.F (ionia temporary facility). another siting was at m.R. dorms (michigan reformatory dorms) 


2. what made you first notice the object? my friend and i went outside of the barracks to smoke cigarettes. i don't know what made me do so but i looked up and saw something in the clear blue sky. i mean you get tired of looking at men all day long. but my friend and i stood out there in front of the barracks smoking cigarettes. i looked at it for about ten seconds trying to figure out what it was that i was looking at. it just hovered there in one spot. i looked over to my friend and tapped him on the shoulder and asked "what is that?" he asked, "what is what?" i pointed to the spot and it was gone. or so i thought. i scanned the immediate area where it was located and then i found it again. it had moved to a different location.I then pointed it out to my friend and he looked at it for a long moment and then said "man i don't know what that is." we then looked down into eachothers eyes and then looked back up at the thing and it was gone. i scanned the whole span of sky and didn't find it again. the second sighting was at m.R. dorms. it was nighttime. i was on my way to a n.A. meeting that i took in order to get out of prison. trust me in prison you take any class necessary to get out even ones that are not needed. all i needed was assaultive offenders class and pre release class. i took that extra class to look good for release. i was released two years later. no i didn't use drugs while in prison. i didn't drink what they call spud juice either. that's home made wine in prison. lol! as i was saying, i left out of my dorm and walked around the building to enter a dorm. i was looking at the sky because in the country you see way and i mean way more stars in the sky than you do in the sicty. i love the countryside. it's beautiful at night. while i was headin towards the door of a dorm i saw a star move from it's stationary position. it moved closer to another star and then stayed still. i had never seen anything like that in my life. from that point it didn't move. (note: i mentioned the first incident to nasa when they used to allow you to ask the astronaught question while they were in space. i never got an answer back. that was when i was first released from prison in 2001) i've seen some strange stuff since then only it wasn't alien phenomena. i've been tailed and everything. i just never told anybody until now. everybody has been trying to make me crazy lately. i guess that comes with the territory when seeing u.F.O.'s and then telling the government that. when i was a child my friends and i used to make fun of white people saying that they saw u.F.O.'s. i have seen strsange things in the sky periodically throughout my life. the spacestation was still in development when i was in prison. but how do you explain the things i saw as a child? i mean as a 9 or 10 year old child? did i have a flight of fancy or a wild imagination? my grandmother had just taken me and my friend from next door to see the fireworks display. i saw what looked like the box on a blimp only there was no blimp. the thing was lighted alll of the way around it. it wasd rectangular and huge. with as much light as there was on the thing you would've plainly seen the blimp or huge ballon on top[. there was none! i no longer make fun of white people for saying that they see u.F.O.'s. i'm not racist either. that was just a phase that we went through. i just went along with it because i didn't want to be made fun of too. but i did see what i saw. i just haven't been abducted or anything like that. from what i here i hope not! i would hate to be anal probed! lol! 



3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? to tell you the truth i didn't know what it was at first. i've heard the roswell story of weather balloons. but those balloons were elongated. this was not. 



4. describe the object and its actions and motions. the one from cildhood is rectangular with lights surrounding it. the second at i.T.F. was spherical shiny. the third just looked like a white dot on a black canvas. the first moved slowly across the sky. the second hovered for a while in one place and in the span of two seconds possibly three it moved a nice distance. i know that it wasn't a balloon bec ause when i was a child my elementary school did a balloon release. we tied cards and everything to the ballon. it was for research. the entire school did it at the same time. so i know how a balloon moves. it may seem stationary but it'as really moving. it doesn't travel great distances in the sp[an of two to three seconds. not a balloon. when i found it again it just hovered there in one spot. when we looked at eachother and then back it was a matter of two to three seconds. it was completely gone! balloons don't just disappear like that. i don't know how many of you have been to prison but i.T.F. is surrounded by nothing but woods. many of the pennitentaries are the exact same way. surrounded by woods. especially when you move further north. wild animals roam them woods. and i wass a trusted prisoner at that. i ended up getting a gate pass and everything and was allowed to gop out into the woods. the third one was basically looking like a star. it was stationary at first and then just moved in a atraight line and then stopped and didn't move again. hey you can try and explain away whatever you like. i know what i saw. you can't tell me nothing differently. 



5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. who would believe me?! my friend and i never told anyone until now of what we saw as children. i only told my friend *(name deleted--cms/sg)and pointed it out. it was a feeling of like i expecte to see it though. there was nothing really important about it so to speak. as if i was used to seeing them. no big deal. but we did one of those moves of where two people are looking at something in shock and look to eachother as if saying do you see what i am seeing and the look back. that what happened. the third was like hold on i know that i am not seeing things. it was like looking at a spot on a wall forf a long time and it seems to move on it's own. only this was a star. and every night that i got the chance i looked and only seen that star in the same place that it had moved to. it was always in the same location every night. 



6. how did you lose sight of the object? i lost sight of the first by watching the fireworks. the second was by taking my eyes off of it. the third it just appeared as a star every night. crazy huh? i have no pictures what so ever because he i was in prison. talk to people in prison if you want to know thet truth!
content.summary: Shiny metallic and round. nore like spherical.

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting a friend's house in grand rapids, mi when i looked out the window and saw the typical disk shaped ufo hovering right over the tree tops about a half to a quarter mile from me out the window.  it was silent and there were about 9 yellow lights on it. one of the lights was on the top.  it was 4:35 pm.  the sky was overcast.  i watched it for about a minute and a half trying to figure out what it was and then i turned to my friend and said, "what is that?" when i turned back to the window, it was gone.  i wrote everything down at the time so i wouldn't forget.
content.summary: Saw disk shaped ufo over tree tops

content.detailedDescription:
When getting home, we noticed a big bright amber object floating in the sky to the west of us.  we watched it hoover in the sky for about 4 minutes moving up, down and side to side.  there was no sound to it and there were no flasing lights.  after a couple minutes, it started moving away from us, moving highter in the sky to the northwest.  within 30 seconds at the most, it was completely gone.  it was about the size of a street slight from a block away.  very big and bring.

my family and i had just gotten home from some.  my 2 girls and i saw it.  my oldest daughter said it kinda looked like a fireball.  i noticed it as i was helping to get them out of the car.  i wasn't exactly sure and still am not what it was, but it definately caught my attention and it was like something i have never seen.  the direction that we saw the object was a clear view to the sky.  there were no city downtown city lights, the airport is not near, etc.  there are a few city lights down the street, but this object was above those.
content.summary: Noticed a large bright amber light in the western sky

content.detailedDescription: Something around 2 am i'm smoking on the balcony then i'm staring to see flashing dots above the lake ontario south of me. i tried to focus and yes bingo here they are. flying down to the lake beyong it dissapering in the space, flying beyong skyline diagonally, i didn't notice solid styraight fly from none of them. some objects there making a line from buttom to up and rotating opposite clock wise horisontially. corrdct my english if looks weird. i'm shoked. i called police they came late but they have noticed the dot still in the sky i assume mother ship because all other at some point have been moving from to and away of it... i noticed this ship may be in a hour of my first seen. some objects were making fly beyong the lake. one object 5-7 lights angle shape made diagonal fly towards east with accelarating insdane speed. one object came from above very bright since then my mom started to belive me that i'm seeing something she wear glasses, but even shge was explaining to police we have seen this guys. my congrats boys and girsk ufo are here. lots of them. video i captured i don't know whjat you wanna find were i watched it already nothing... wow. at some point looked like they have been flying into the lake and then again up and away with crazy speeds - not ours... one object made it beyong the lake to the east and then round shape right up!!! they are here, i'm not crazy! one plane went towards them than turned little and went away... helicopter made it 5 click away of shore and flew away too. but they had to see... i dunno my video no good unless you can may be retrive something,,, cointact me me come over i will show directions how they flew... no reason for now attache video... i will look once again for editing
content.summary: A benefis of huge amount (hundreds) of objects with not our speeds above lake ontario

content.detailedDescription: As i was outside listening to music and having a conversation with the family. i was trying to see the stars out night, being that it was a very clear night. i notice something come into my periphal vision. it was a orange object shaped like an hourglass that was laid over on it's side. it was spinning and moving at a high rate of speed. i live very close to bush iah airport i am familar with airplane flight patterns (they usually fly right over head from a north to south) and this object wasn't moving on the usual path. for takeoff or arrivals. it wasn't bright but it was definitely there. i tried to get others to see it but it moved to fast for them to locate in the sky. it was moving at a pretty impressive speed. now i'm not saying that i am certain it was a "spaceship" or that this couldn't be explained away as something else. but i am pretty familar with airplanes and helicopters that fly over head and this didn't look like anything normal.It moved too fast to get an accurate look at it and it was dimly lit. i thought i would just pass this along to you to see if you had any other reports.
content.summary: I observed a rotating hour glass shaped object cross the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My neighbor and i came out of her apartment around 7:45pm mst when we saw several orange lights in the sky.  i used to travel near edwards in the late 80s early 90s and had seen stealth planes flying at dusk.  

at first look, three of lights looked like they could be in that shape.  my neighbor's daughter was in the military and so we got her.  as soon as she came out, it turned and the lights formed a perfect isosceles triangle.  then it shifted again and there seemed to only be one light in that area.  it had been flying southwest at first, but then after rotating and changing shape, it went east.  

that is when we observed several more lights coming up in the sky from the west all going east.  some appeared to go up and then back down again.  one even stopped as another seemed to be lagging behind.  this went on for five or ten minutes as at least 20 lights progressed across the sky very rapidly and then just vanish when they got to the same point in the east.  

then we saw about four stragglers that appeared after the others were gone.  they were not together.  as one disappeared in the east, we would see another rise in the west.  

we live five miles from sky harbor international airport.  we are used to seeing several planes in the evening coming from the north and then circle around and land at the airport, but generally in the evening they land from the west, not the east.  not to mention disappear while landing.  also, airplane lights are white, red or blue.  not orange.  they appeared to gain altitude before disappearing.  

it then a few minutes later, we saw what were obviously planes coming from the north and then turn and go east.  they did not appear to be big enough to be commercial jet, but could have been commuter planes.  

we heard no sound coming from these multiple things.  as for my feelings, at first when i saw just the three lights i thought might be a stealth was curiosity.  as far as i know, our base does not test or have any stealth a/c.  then when it turned and became a triangle, rotated again and rapidly changed direction, i got chills down my spine. 

unfortunately, we do not own quality cameras and could not catch any video or pictures.  hopefully in a city this large someone else did.  i noticed several cars driving down our street stop and then continue on when it was over.

i am not sure if it was happening earlier as my cat was going nuts every so often for about 30 minutes prior.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three orange lights forming isosceles triangle other several others appeared single lights

content.detailedDescription: "following my departure from denpasar bali airport by commercial airlines, air asia, to singapore.  approximately thirty minutes out, i saw, looking south with a westerly direction of my flight, down to the first cloud level (as we were probably 20,000 feet in elevation), i witnessed an elliptical / cylindrical air craft ufo, flying eastward along the coast.  camera failure was the distraction at this time and when i looked back the object (slow flight) continued on and changed direction and was now flying south into the island, away from the coast.  this region has no occupation of anything more than remote villages as no city was anywhere in view along the coast region of the island of madura. as the air asia airlines continued it's course west towards singapore, i saw the craft continue on it's course south until it went out of sight.  semi cloudly day of cumulus formations with clear views at the twenty thousand foot elevation."
content.summary: Ellipitical / cylindrical with a size at least double of a 747 jet airliner...

content.detailedDescription:
After watching this light replayed from where the night vision cameras recorded the bright light on top of neighbors hse @ 3 am something grey jumps off the roof 
i did not c it with my own eyes! then the grey creature jumps back on to the same roof!

(everything was recorded by night vision cameras)

for the last three nights starting at 3am we have seen that se light that was on my neighbors roof but up in the trees! i waited to see what would happen to these "star"
like objects in the trees. these star like lights slowlyove up the tree then come out the top of the tree as dawn gets closer they move higher up in the sky. 
i have each movement recorded. then right before dawn you can see a metallic shape then when dawn breaks they can not be seen. there are a few other incidences too! i finally got a flir and had thermally loocated something in the woods. as i kept a bright spot light on this image it made a weird noise a couple of x and all of a sudden myself and my 11 and 8 yr old kids saw what would look like a falling star. only it sprung up from where i had been shinning the light on it . it flew up from the ground arched accross the neighbors house and went up into the sky! 

i can send u video of all of this!

i really need someone to come witness this!

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
i don't know how to attach video will email them i do have one on youtube!
content.summary: Have night vision security cameras recorded bright flashing light on top of hse

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend decided to go to the beach for a late night walk. so we parked by ron jon surf shop and started walking towards the pier. as we got to the pier we sat down and talked for a  while. when we started walking back we continued talking and looking at the stars, when she suddenly said " do you see that?!" as i looked at where she pointed i saw a huge boomerang shaped object at first i thought it was a spot light cause of its faint color  but as we continued to look at it appeared to be a faint white color with a main large bright light in the middle surrounded with more smaller dimmer lights it moved at a fast rate of speed faster than a plane but it appeared to be "cruising" as it moved towards cape canaveral when it suddenly disappeared both me and my girlfriend saw the same thing and just stood there in shock i was kind of freaked out  but  amazed and ive had goosebumps since the sightings someone please let me know if you saw the same thing on 03/25-26/2011
content.summary: Faint white  colored boomerang with bright light in the middle and many smaller lights
